Erkek arkadaşımın önerisiyle aldım şimdi başından kalkmıyoru(z)m. Yani sıkıldıysanız ve saracak bir oyun arıyorsanız tavsiye ederim. Tek başına pek keyifli olmuyor arkadaşlarla daha keyifli ama tek iken katil oynamak baya sarıyor. Oyunlar hakkında pek bilgim yok o yüzden detaya inmicem güzel işte alın.

Pour reprendre un célèbre YouTuber, le ratio plaisir souffrance est meilleur dans un club SM...
Outre la pléthore de bugs, la communauté toxique au possible et  l'équilibrage inexistant, ce jeu favorise le manque de fair-play
La mécanique est telle qu’être un parfait enc... euh un joueur pas très réglo est plus rétributif que de jouer correctement et avec stratégie.
L'ajout massif de perk et la lenteur à obtenir les personnage et débloquer les dite perk font qu'il est quasi impossible pour un joueur occasionnel de se s'offrir un choix quand aux stratégie de jeu. (minimum 150 parties pour un nouveau perso)

Je déconseille vivement ce jeu aux personnes souhaitant se détendre et prendre du bon temps. 
Par contre, si vous aimez perdre dix minutes dans un lobby à attendre qu'un tueur s'acharne à vous camper sur un crochet et vous focus pour que vous mourriez en quatre minutes montre en main ou qu'une bande de survivant tea- bagueurs et exécrable au possible dans le chat vous bully, ce jeu est fait pour vous!

I bought the game.

The MMR matchmaking feels like suicidial tendencies.

It wants to test your patience and skills, but the MMR does not let you train your patience and skills first without matching with either absolutely begginer survivors and proffesional veteran killer or opposite.

I did not play multiplayer games for a reason I gave myself years ago. I now remember the reason and if somebody wants you to play this game, politely decline them.

Also, the behaviour team is 100% against solo survivors for the fact that killers are getting buffed with some of their perks, already annoying, get more annoying.

Hopefully I will commit seppuku and haunt the devs.

i started playing this game around late 2019, and while it's had huge ups and downs (mostly downs), i still find myself dumping hundreds of hours into it.

as an average killer main enjoyer, shit used to be rough with strong second-chance survivor perks, gen speeds, infinite tile loops, etc., but the game has gotten a lot better over the years with the addition of breakable walls, perk adjustments, and so on. games overall feel more fair and are more enjoyable.

the devs do a really good job on the aesthetic, themes, and gameplay concepts of killers, and they've been releasing some scary-ass killers lately, like the dredge, who's an absolutely terrifying killer to go against since he makes the entire map pitch black and can immediately pop out of lockers without warning. most, if not all, killers should be terrifying to go up against, imo. the maps the devs make are also always really interesting (balance is another thing *COUGHRPDCOUGH*). they've also got some pretty nice cosmetics you can buy for a lot of survivors and killers, but they also have a lot of meh cosmetics and some straight-up Ls.

i'm writing this review in the wake of the hype-af progression update and perk overhaul, which i'm excited to see. grinding will be cut down so much, and the meta is finally switching up after what feels like forever. i still wish devs would get rid of tiered perks and just make them single perk tiers—it would literally only be a benefit for the game as a whole and be easier on the devs, since they'd only have to work on and balance one perk each instead of three. and imagine getting the perks you want faster so you can play with unique builds and perk-synergy concepts you come up with as soon as possible, instead of holding left-click on a thousand bloodweb nodes for like a month. giving players the ability to play around and theorycraft freely feels better for player retention and interest than the frustrating bloodweb grind players have had to endure for the past 6 years.

survivor is pretty fun to play, and killer is also super fun now. a lot of great movie killers, so i'd recommend this game if you love horror movies or just horror in general. the game itself is not necessarily a horror game (with the exception of a few killers and killer builds); it's more of a thriller game, but both survivor and killer roles can be very rewarding (but on the flip side, also very punishing). really hope they keep adding licensed killers into the game—would absolutely love to see candyman, the tall man from phantasm, chucky from child's play, pumpkinhead, maybe some kind of dead space collaboration.

keep it up, bhvr. i think you've done a pretty good job so far

“如此有潜力的化合物……即便只有一点点都能造成非同寻常的反应。” —— 塔尔伯特·格莱姆斯的日记
“如果你认为这些实验室某种生物学反应的话也太缺乏想像力了。” —— 塔尔伯特·格莱姆斯的日记
“请不要这么做……”
“这名学生被指控为了进行未经批准的科学测试而盗墓。”——塔尔伯特·格莱姆斯的学院训诫，1838年
“…可能引起神经节律动的非典型改变。”——未标记的神秘学校课文
“在一片满是遗忘梦境与无尽循环的废土物中，有办法出去的人就是神。”——塔尔伯特·格莱姆斯
“死亡仅仅是个开始。”
“进步需要彻底性的改变。”——塔尔伯特·格莱姆斯
“时间很宝贵。希望这次会有效……”——塔尔伯特·格莱姆斯

２周年の頃からCS機で遊んでおり、６周年イベントからSteamに移行。
相変わらず難易度設定が間違っている。生存者が殺人鬼をいじめるゲーム。

今回のイベントでキラーランクを彩１、サバイバーランクを彩４まで上げたが、どう見てもサバイバーの方が楽。
生存者は脳死で発電機を回して、誰かが吊られてもキラーが離れているうちに救助して発電機を回せばいいが、
キラーは生存者を追いかけながら発電機の修理状況を考え、マルチタスクをこなさなければならない。
苦労して生存者をダウンさせた後も、フック破壊やライト救助を一度でもされれば絶対に勝てなくなる。
やればやるほどキラーは面白くない。

では何故やるのか。勝つために必要なパークを揃えるために、BPという経験値が必要で、
キラー側の方がBPの入りが良いから。
運営側も定期的にBP２倍イベントを開催しており、ゲームやイベントの面白さではなく、
BPの獲得量でアクティブユーザーを増やしている。

６周年を経ても尚、ゲームバランスの調整を間違え続けている。
悪いことは言わないから、新規ユーザーはやらない方がいい。
Youtubeで実況動画を見て満足するにとどめるか、生存者だけやるに留めることをお勧めする。

（2022年7月21日追記）

I started playing DBD, not really knowing what to expect. But I love playing DBD! I play with my friends all the time. If it wasn't for DBD, i wouldn't be able to do much with my friends, but now I can hop on my computer and have fun with my friends whenever i want. DBD is a great horror game, and it's not even that gory! I would highly recommend playing Dead by Daylight!
